common.404: Something went wrong, try again later.

auth.required: You need to be logged in.
auth.forbidden: You do not have permission for this action.

api.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
api.invalidResponseStatus: API returned an invalid response status.

sync.invalidServerResponse: Sync server returned an invalid response.
sync.noReceiversFound: No receivers found for this sync event.
sync.invalidClientResponse: Sync client returned an invalid response.
sync.clientRejected: Sync event was rejected by client validation.
sync.clientFilteredOut: You are not in the required context for this sync event.

error.invalidResponse: Server returned an invalid error response.

login.emailCharacterLimit: Email can't be longer than 191 characters.
login.passwordCharacterMinimum: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
login.passwordCharacterLimit: Password can't be longer than 191 characters.
login.nameCharacterLimit: Name can't be longer than 191 characters.

settings.sizeToLarge: Max upload size is 4~5 MB, chose a smaller img!!

docs.selectApiOrSync: Select an API or sync event.
docs.syncHttpHowItWorksTitle: How sync + HTTP works on this page
docs.syncHttpHowItWorksLine1: HTTP sync trigger calls /sync/... and the server broadcasts through Socket.io to users in the same room.
docs.postmanLine1: Use Cookie auth header: token=YOUR_SESSION_TOKEN, or keep Postman cookie jar enabled after login.
docs.postmanLine2: Set language header with Accept-Language (preferred) or X-Language (also supported).
docs.postmanLine3: API URL format: /api/{page}/{name}/{version} and Sync URL format: /sync/{page}/{name}/{version}.
docs.httpGuideLine1: Use HTTP for one-time API calls or to trigger a sync broadcast from backend routes.
docs.httpGuideLine2: For protected routes, authenticate first so your browser cookie or token is included.
docs.httpGuideLine3: Set header Accept-Language to control localized error messages.
docs.socketGuideLine1: Use Socket mode for real-time callback responses and room-based broadcasts.
docs.socketGuideLine2: Join a room before testing broadcasts so you can receive the emitted sync event.
docs.socketGuideLine4: Use ignoreSelf when you want to broadcast to everyone except your current client.
